# SitesBanao - Website Design Agency for Indian Businesses

## About
SitesBanao is an affordable website design agency serving small and local businesses across India. Founded by Virendra Vaishnav in 2025, we specialize in building professional, mobile-friendly websites for restaurants, salons, clinics, pet stores, gyms, hotels, and other local businesses.

## Services
- Professional Website Design & Development
- Mobile-Responsive Design (Mobile-First)
- Google Maps Integration
- WhatsApp Business Integration
- SEO Optimization
- Custom Domain Setup
- Fast Hosting on Vercel CDN
- Menu/Services Pages
- Photo Gallery
- Contact Forms
- Booking Systems (Pro plan)

## Pricing
- Basic Plan: ₹9,999 — Single-page professional website with WhatsApp, Google Maps, mobile responsive
- Standard Plan: ₹14,999 — Multi-page website with contact forms, SEO, social media integration
- Pro Plan: ₹19,999 — Full-featured website with booking system, payment integration, admin dashboard

## Stats
- 1,334+ leads generated across 4 cities
- 100+ demo websites built
- Cities served: Jaipur (265 leads), Jodhpur (498 leads), Udaipur (51 leads), Indore (520 leads)
- Delivery time: 7 days (most sites ready in 24-48 hours)

## Cities & Areas Served
- Jaipur: C-Scheme, Malviya Nagar, Vaishali Nagar, Mansarovar, Tonk Road
- Jodhpur: Sardarpura, Paota, Shastri Nagar, Ratanada, Chopasni Road
- Udaipur: Fateh Sagar, Hathi Pol, Sukhadia Circle, Chetak Circle
- Indore: Vijay Nagar, Palasia, Sapna Sangeeta, AB Road, South Tukoganj

## Business Types We Serve
Restaurants, Cafés, Bakeries, Salons, Pet Stores, Hotels, Guest Houses, Clinics, Gyms, Coaching Centers, Boutiques, Jewellery Shops, Wedding Venues, Handicraft Shops

## Team

- Sachin — Sales Lead

## Languages
Hindi, English (Bilingual support)

## Technology
Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, Vercel, TypeScript
